title: trace
description: Trace metadata for correlating requests and receipts across agents, hops, and spans.

trace_id.description: Logical trace identifier shared across related calls/spans.

span_id.description: Identifier for this specific operation/span within the trace.

parent_span_id.description: Optional parent span identifier if this span is delegated or nested.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp indicating when this span started.

duration_ms.description: Duration of this span in milliseconds, if known.

labels.description: Optional structured labels/tags for this span. Safe to log and forward.
